nodes.text: Paralope were grazing herd animals native to Talus.

Paralope sported two backward pointing horns. Their young had fur in a shade of either gray or black. They were a common sight, and specimens could also be found on Corellia, though its unknown how they arrived there. This goes for most Talusian creatures that ended up on Corellia
The acicular defender was a subspecies bred for the defense of the herd.
